topic.title: How to create a new account in Steam ?
topic.shortdesc: Here im going to show you how to create a new account by using the Steam client.

body.p:
Prerequisites : You need to download the Steam client first before you can create a new account.Here is the link from where you can dowload it.
Open you'r steam client that looks like this :
Click the "Create a New Account..." button from the Steam login page.
After you click "Create a New Account" then it will show you a window with information that needs to be filled in order to create a new account.
